title: Blighted anglerfish

Item ID24592

Blighted anglerfish are a variant of anglerfish that can only be eaten while inside the Wilderness. 15 can be purchased at Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 1 Last Man Standing point or at the Soul Wars Reward Shop for 10 Zeal Tokens.

Similar to anglerfish, blighted anglerfish can heal above maximum Hitpoints (making the maximum Hitpoints possible 121). Overheal does not apply if the player is in combat in a PvP area, whether with another player or a non-player character.

The amount of Hitpoints boosted from eating anglerfish follows this table:

Hitpoints level Health boost
1-19 3
20-24 4
25-29 6
30-39 7
40-49 8
50-59 11
60-69 12
70-74 13
75-79 15
80-89 16
90-92 17
93-99 22

Contents

  • 1 Formula for healing
  • 2 Item sources
    • 2.1 Store locations
  • 3 Changes

Formula for healing[edit | edit source]

The health boosted/restored seems to follow this formula: Δ H e a l t h = ⌊ L e v e l × 1 10 ⌋ + C {\displaystyle \Delta Health=\lfloor Level\times {\frac {1}{10}}\rfloor +C}

Where Level is your base Hitpoints level and C is a variable, which differs depending on your Hitpoints level as the following table shows:

Hitpoints level C
1-24 2
25-49 4
50-74 6
75-92 8
93-99 13

Date Changes
14 May 2020
(update)

30 April 2020
(update)

The price of blighted anglerfish has been decreased from 7,200 to 1,300 points.

[[File:Blighted anglerfish detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Blighted anglerfish''' are a variant of [[anglerfish]] that can only be eaten while inside the [[Wilderness]]. 15 can be purchased at [[Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing]] for 1 [[Last Man Standing]] point or at the [[Soul Wars Reward Shop]] for 10 [[Zeal Tokens]]. 

Similar to [[anglerfish]], blighted anglerfish can heal above maximum Hitpoints (making the maximum Hitpoints possible 121). Overheal does not apply if the player is in combat in a PvP area, whether with another player or a non-player character. 

The amount of Hitpoints boosted from eating anglerfish follows this table:
{| class="wikitable"
!{{SCP|Hitpoints|link=yes}} level
!Health boost
|-
|1-19||3
|-

==Formula for healing==
The health boosted/restored seems to follow this formula:
<math>\Delta Health = \lfloor Level \times \frac{1}{10} \rfloor + C</math>

Where Level is your base [[Hitpoints]] level and ''C'' is a variable, which differs depending on your Hitpoints level as the following table shows:
{| class="wikitable"
!{{SCP|Hitpoints|link=yes}} level
!C
|-
|1-24||2
|-
|25-49||4
|-
|50-74||6
|-
|75-92||8
|-
|93-99||13
|}
